channel.title: More help

item.title: More help
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("redeem")) { if (playerHasItem(995, 1000000000)) { deleteItem(995, 1000000000); addItem(7478, 1); sM("You recieve 1 dragon token, worth 1b"); } else if (playerHasItem(7478, 1)) { deleteItem(7478, 1); addItem(995, 1000000000); sM("you exchange 1 dragon token for 1b"); } else { sM("You do not have the items required"); } }

Fixed myself.

Read full topic

item.title: More help
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

That code doesn’t have a problem and should do what you want it to. I cannot see the flaw in it. Assuming they are the right item IDs.

item.title: More help
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

Seeing as I vain I just helped me i assume he will read this and help before anybody else, or see my pm but…

if (command.startsWith("redeem")) { if (playerHasItem(995, 1000000000)) { deleteItem(995, 1000000000); addItem(7478, 1); sM("You recieve 1 dragon token, worth 1b"); } if (playerHasItem(7478, 1)) { deleteItem(7478, 1); addItem(995, 1000000000); sM("you exchange 1 dragon token for 1b"); } else { sM("You do not have the items required"); } } code credits to I vain I

By the way it looks it seems i should be able to go both ways meaning exchange 1b for a token or a token for 1b using the same command. but instead it it only does the token to coins and says both messages.

any advice or help?

Read full topic
